Package com.render

package com.render
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AntiAliasing
    Provides anti-aliased rendering routines for Mandelbrot set visualization.
    LayoutElement
    Represents a square region in a 2D pixel layout grid.
    MandelbrotColoring
    Converts the results of Mandelbrot set evaluations into RGB color values.
    RenderUtils
    Utility methods for rendering and layout generation in Mandelbrot visualizations.
    VideoCreator
    Utility for converting a sequence of image frames into an MP4 video using FFmpeg.
